google_play_reviews.content: Been playing for years
Love this game. The fact that you can replay time and time again make this the perfect game
best game out there!!!! good if you don't have too much time to go through a whole round of something. you can always pick up where you left off
Peak mobile game.

Amazing game in the cespool that is typically mobile gaming. Open-source! Zero ads! Has been worked on for 8+ years, tons of replayability, combinations, items, and interactions. Super cool that it's available for free on Android, and is also multiplatform. Definitely consider supporting with money if you also enjoy the game, dev earned it. Multiplayer would be awesome but that would certainly come with big design decisions and solutions needed. Can't recommend the game enough, thanks.
This game is just way to hard in the early portion to be fun and I have been playing it for 2 days straight
The only good mobile game
awesome games, you die a lot at first. but after 100 games, the last 6 of my surface ending are accompanied by rats.
super addictive
Your game is too hard... And that's exactly what I came for, 5 out of 5. :D

Hard as nails but compellingly brilliant. Get used to dying a lot until you work out the mechanics and strategies to let you progress. Well done devs, your game puts 99% of the rest on the app store to shame.

Very hard game. There is probably some depth to it but it is way too difficult to progress far enough to discover any of the more advanced mechanics. The 'seeds' and 'stones' item feel kind of weird: You throw them (or plant them in the case of the later) to create traps and AoE spells. Very hard to figure out where to effectively use them in combat with moving or 'too close for comfort' enemies. Also, moving around and picking objects can be difficult to do with any precision.
awesome rougelike alot like Entangled.
Simple fun without the pay to win or ads most mobile games have.
great game been playing for 2 years, but i will forever hold a grudge against the crabs. nerf them evan please im begging you
Love it
Be careful if you're easily offended by world war 2 Germany as there are hidden rooms shaped like a swastika in this game
Don't know what I'm doing wrong but I can't even get past lvl 2 . I get stuck don't know where to go and get killed by snakes every time . Probably a game I just need to delete .
Really nice, Clean and simple iteration and I really enjoy the variety of ways they tweaked everything along with the balance updates.
Really fun game with surprising depth
tough but fun

classic old school dungeon crawl, it's so good. multiple classes so many starts, plays like crypt of the necromancer tower of drauga-ish. best part no micro transactions at all dude it's just a good game. hard AF though but not in the unfair way. support this one it's one of the last real passion projects on mobile
I been playing the game for a couple of hours and I really like it so far

I love this game so much but 1 thing could be better. You should make some kind duo co-op mode with more enemies who are stronger. Me and my friend think that would be awsome and it would make this game even better. Please make this happen! Ps i googled pc versions an they seem bigger and more developed so can you make mobile version like that?

Nearly a perfect game... TL:DR Great game just add seeded runs and creative mode. There's just a few things I would like to see added: - firstly, the possibility to insert seeds to play a seeded run. (I know it is possible but it would be great if it was more user friendly) - secondly, the ability to start a "creative" run (toggolable godmode, spawn items, etc...) Other than that, I think this game is amazing and I'm sure that with the current update schedule this game has great possibility.
Loved Rogue style games since I played Rogue by Epyx in 85 on my C64 & later my Amiga & this game won't disappoint any Rogue fansüëç
Hella fun and simple. Love such a rare gem as this!
Keep playing, it grows on you
outstanding game!!
anyone who plays d&d will love this game
Wow. I've rarely come across a Cell Phone game that is as fun as it is addictive. It's a super hard game. The challenge is what keeps you going. Cheers!
Very balanced, rogue-like game. Though it might be too hard for some people, with a little perseverance, you can make it.
Great game. Challenging but in a good way. If you played MUDs in the 90s you'll love this
Good game, very enjoyable

Its the best version of rpg pixel dungeon. I recommend you put in some skins when a player has made an achievement like an epic skin for a berserker if he finished a run with 3 challenges and legendary skin if he finished a run with 6 or more challenges.

it's very time to figure out how it works it's also really hard
game's good and the add a new has joined and he's my favourite one.I love the it has so many floors to explore.10/10 well done
Wonderful Game indeed. Simple & intresting but hard to master.
a little hard to get used to, but it's fun
great game which is fun enough to play over again.

I have been playing the, I guess original version? Of Pixel dungeon for years. The old one is bit more simpler and super hard as this one seems to be. The basic mechanisms seems to be the same but there is nice additions and lots of new things. Great game!
lots of fun. different classes to choose from. different types of style of playing.
One of the best mobile games with no mobile game bs like ads n stuff. Just a pure game through and through
Nicely engaging dungeon crawler
Best mobile game I've played in ages!

Amazing game!! For me, one of the things I didn't like about it was the lack of music, and now it has that too. Can't wait to finish it again.
it's amazing he is the opposite of pay to win this deserves more then it has

long time fan of every iteration of pixel dungeon. I'm always late for everything because of this brilliant game. wish I had the means to support in a more meaningful way.

Love this, even with all the rage it creates within me. My only complaint is that the warrior does not start with the higher-strength as compared to the rest of the characters, otherwise it's golden in my book
One of best mobile rogue games. Initial learning curve is challenging. But gets easier once you figure out the play style

Awesome game. Basically the thing I think about most when someone mentions a dungeon game. I sometime with the game was longer or for more equipment etc, but not because it lacks in those areas, i would just love it to get to spent even more time in the game than I do. Perfect offline game for travelling and great in total.

I love this game, when I first played I found it really frustrating and confusing but when I played more I got used to it and found more things out it turned out to be awesome me and my 2 friends all play it now. thanks for the awesome game, good work and I can't wait to see it grow!

Personally I found the game too difficult and frustrating. Got down to the 4th floor after many annoying deaths with enemies dodging every attack. I assumed there would be a checkpoint system after every few levels, but reading the reviews it suggests not. I'm going to stop playing now before I finally make some progress then lose it all and have to start again. Perhaps Roguelikes are not for me.
Great game if you like rouge like games
a well done roguelike!
hard but rewarding
pretty fun
great game! so many nuances and fun things, definitely scratches my problem solving itch!
Phenomenal game. I don't even know how else to say it, this game is just an excellent time killer for when I'm bored or have no wifi.

Challenging and engrossing, an excellent game that's still being updated and expanded on. Steep difficulty curve and highly strategic, would definitely recommend to any who have the patience to learn it's mechanics.
love this game, hard but fun

Dropping my original review its a meh game but holy hell is it ever more luck based you basically need a miracle to get through this game Cursed items just ruin it especially when its a good wand or overall good weapon snakes are just dumb literally dodging every attack possible except magical ones bosses are ok early game but DM-300 is like god mode Only way i finished that one was because.i got good items overall heavily luck based and not that fun -2 stars
Great dungeon crawler!
Great game! You don't have to watch an ad to get anything and can just play! I recommend downloading it!
Easily the most straightforward and enjoyable roguelike I've played, and it's completely free. The content additions, tweaks, and overhauls have been consistently great

this is an amazing time suck. if you really want to get the most out of it, do not use a wiki. it's simple fun and it is definitely worth kicking something to the developer. remember kids, toss a coin to your witcher
love this game constantly challenging and different. I was extremely excited to see the duelist was finally added.
very enjoyable little game. Real old school. Great fun üëç.
Great dungeon crawler once you learn how to survive a few floors

This is not only my favorite phone game, but easily my favorite video game in general. That's coming from a guy who hates phone games. This game has been it for me for a few years; it has so much to do, there's a strong element of strategy without affecting the fun of battle, and it is full of surprises. I also very rarely write reviews, this game is just that good. When the 2.0 version came out I just about crapped my pants. Awesome!
i like this fsr
I remember playing this when I was little. I tried searching everywhere and finally found it. It's an awesome game.
Fun if u like D&D style

Even being on a phone this game is pretty amazing. It has a nice degree of difficulty and a decent learning curve. It's pretty satisfying once you get the hang of it. I've been in a rouge like kick for a little while now and this is great for when I'm away from home, honestly even when I'm home.
No ads. No micro transactions. Just a fun and challenging game.
Excellent, every game you start is new unexplored. Best of all can be offline.

Looks cool but not fun died to fish that I couldn't kill first time, and then to snakes that dodged my every attack even after doing the door sneak attack the game suggests. You just die over and over to enemies that dodge every attack...
I love the game !! super super fun ! and free!!! they don't try to make you buy things every 5 seconds

Amazing no ads dungeon crawler, so much fun trying to work out what items will do. It is difficult at first unless you get some good stuff. Easily one of the best games I have played in a long while. Some great innovative features.
The best variation of pixel dungeon around. This is one of the most fun mobile games to play.
Simply a fun dungeon/turn based game!
exceptional free game that challenges. should win many awards
great rendition
a really run dungeon crawler so far

I like this game. It's a great time killer and I can play it whenever I want. It's autosave also means I can just close it and play it when I have time. Hey, devs I found a glitch where if I close the game after hitting an enemy and then start the game again. Those enemies won't attack you.
Dont get it

A truly RNG based Roguelite. What that means isn't that every time you die or win it was because of dice, but more of you have to really think about all of your options with what you have. Sometimes you'll get an OP staff one time, some random seeds another, but so long as you know how and when to use them, you'll win anyways! This game is a lot more tactical then I think a lot of the negative reviews give it credit for. Besides, 100's of hours into a free game? Great value to time ratio lol
it's an amazing game simple and a lot of things to discover and the story also good üëç
great game
Love this game, but diabolically difficult lol I have played lots and only beat 1 boss before perishing.

With a few words: This is hands down one of the best mobile games I've played recently!The vintage aesthetics are pleasing, the hud is simple, mechanics are easy to grasp,but the game has a steep learning curve and pretty hardcore gameplay. For advanced Roguelike RPG players only!
Truly a fun experience!
The game is difficult at the start but if you run different characters, you can find your niche

I love the sytle of the game and gameplay. I would suggest checkpoints for every new level (or every 5 floors), as the game gets harder the longer you play. Having to restart from the beginning due hunger and not finding enough food made me lose interest in the game after a few days, especially after all the progress and how long it took me to get as far.

really fun and easy to learn, i'd recommend it to others

exactly what I hoped to find. Fun and relaxing grind. Feels like a new indie classic in the store. Not really super unique or creative, but the devs put in the effort and made a quality game that I've enjoyed for hours, so thanks for that!

Download this roguelike turn-based action-RPG now! So much replayability and the difficulty level is tuned very well. You will die many time but get better in ways that will allow you to advance farther in the game even though your character starts the same each time (4 classes to choose from, currently). It's easy to pick up and put down as you have time in your day to play for a few minutes. It's free but consider contributing!

I love how compact the game is. There are a lot of fun secret to be explored in the game. And I like the fact that we need to (re-)discover it every time so that each game play is a unique experience. However, I think some of the mechanics can be relaxed for example the hunger and replenish items. Most of the time the character died not because of strong enemy but because of lack of food, which is quite frustrating. But still a great mini game for me!
Be ready for a grind, a fun and for the most part kid friendly series of adventures

No ads, all fun. A simple, intuitive game with a lot of depth. No pay to win, just play, and try not to die. It is frustrating at first, but gets easier as you pick up hints and identify items. I can play hours, a great game with no pretentions or ads.

google_play_reviews.replyContent: A food ration will satisfy enough hunger to last for 300 turns. If you're getting hungry much faster than that there must be something that's increasing your hunger, such as the metabolism armor curse. Frequently using the search function also can make you hungry very quickly.

great game

Difficulty level is high, but after several play-thrus you get the hang out it. It's actually quite a lot of game, with no ads or pay-wall. I've played for several hours, and only now (after defeating the first boss) did I receive a polite request for a review. I also left a donation, but it doesn't affect the game play at all (it's not pay-to-win). There's still a lot to this game that I haven't discovered yet either, so... really well done, developer. You have my gratitude.

Nearly everything has been carefully crafted. The music, especially the bosses, sound so good for a mobile game. The gameplay is peak with diverse ways to play. The only downsides are you have to pay on Apple. And, despite the music sounding way good. There's really only one track for every type of floor. Doesn't mean it's bad but I would like some more awesome tracks. Other than that, it's awesome. The only reason why it gets one star is because people are dumb. Or don't know what to do.

One day I searched for a game similar to Castle of the Winds & found this gem. Little did I know that I was downloading addiction, late nights, & attention sucking madness in the form of gaming at my fingertips. It's loads of fun and no matter how many times I died, I grinned & told myself 'next time; U are not yet defeated' (even tho I clearly was). You'll laugh, you'll cry, you'll grow farther from your family as you spiral into constant gaming madness...srsly tho, it's a good game. Try it!
This game is super fun and a great way to pass time, but I honestly feel bad for the people in the reviews saying the game is "Too hard" because it's suppose to be its a game of challenge lol

This game is incredible. The devs put a lot of effort and they created a gem. It is fun, challenging, has a lot of mecanics. Good game. Coolest dungeon in my opinion. I would suggest adding food that can spawn again on levels you already completed as a solution. Still, a really nice game

This game is incredibly fun at times and has a huge amount of unique mechanics that you can use to progress. However it does have a big problem with it's difficulty. You constantly bump into enemies that can be very irritating as they take a long time to defeat. They're too powerful for they're own good and you mostly have to rely on the game giving you decent items or else you will be too under-powered to progress. I recommend adding checkpoints to the game.

In my opinion, the best version of Pixel Dungeon so far. Adds in a LOT of new mechanics and items to expand build variety, without making things overly complex. I've been playing on and off for the past 4 years, and it's always been a blast. Highly recommended for avid Roguelike enjoyers.

Excellent roguelike dungeon crawler! Proper traditional dungeons with unidentified scrolls and potions and things, very useful built-in help (magnifying glass button) and tutorial. Of particular note is the surprisingly rich and complex alchemy system that gets gradually explained over your first several plays. If you like turn-based dungeoneering this is definitely worth your time!
Well made game with deep mechanics, very intresting even if you never played rougelikes before. No forced ads or monetization, you can support the devs whenever you want.

This game is the best, I first downloaded it cause pixel dungeon suddenly crashed that made it's Pixels Bugged, I thought this was the end of pixel dungeon, It was 2021 when I first heard about this and started downloading it, The graphics are beutifull and the tiles had depths!! its so amazing!!, it had Scroll Mini-picture above it so I can easily choose the scroll Without Any hesitation! i Can't wait for the seeded runs update!!

Best game on the app store in my opinion. Clearly a labor of love by the developer. And the entire game is F2P without ads if you choose. SPD is a roguelike dungeon crawl, where you develop a character based on your class, subclass, talents, and found items, to delve deeper through 5 levels and defeat 5 bosses. After you get the hang of it and get a few wins, you can increase the difficulty with challenges, which also customize the gameplay beyond just scaling the numbers.
Good for waiting rooms and bus rides!

This is a great game. It's very sudden death. There are 8 different classes to play, 9 different handicaps that you can enable for the bragging rights once it starts getting easy, and so many combinations of equipment that you can find and build your character around that it never gets boring. And it's in active development, so "optimal" keeps shifting as new features come online and you need to figure out how best to exploit them. Highly recommend üëç

When I first downloaded this version of pixel dungeon more than a year or so ago, it was fun and added a few interesting options outside the vanilla version, but that was about it. Coming back now and seeing all the updates like new and reworked items, enhanced music, much more interesting enemies and bosses, class progression, and more, it goes to show that a lot of care and effort has been put into the experience. I'm glad I decided to come back and play again! It's even better than before!

GG. Here's an idea to make the inventory system more streamlined. Instead of only allowing 4 static button presses, also allow for a gesture in one direction or the other immediately afterward with, perhaps to 3 or 4 more user-directed options? This could increase the effective hotbar size from 4 to 16 with the same amount of screen estate. Again, GG would recommend.

Great fun so far, and just the right amount of time to play out an attempt. (or more than one if I get unlucky) Interesting item and mob variation, simple but cool skill tree, and the need to identify items adds to the risk/reward gamble in the game. The rogue seemed like it would be cool, but sucks when running out of thrown items.

If you know what a rogue is... this is it FULLY. Very rich and juicy...BUT. one mechanic is too brutal. Hunger! If I could some how not walk around starving (and NOT healing) for 80% of the game, then it would be a flawless rogue on the phone. Just a little tweak that I could make like more food drops or longer fullness would make this the perfect rogue. That said, it is nearly everything you could want from a rogue... made for a phone. Superior game that many of you will love.

Best mobile game I've ever played. The first few hours are tough but once you figure out a strategy and play style it is very rewarding. People saying that its all rng just haven't spent any time learning the game. The game is very, very balanced. I've beaten the game with every class and subclass and my only preference is my playstyle. Please keep it up devs!
the game is really challenging and really fun. so satisfying to actually beat it.
One of the best pd mods, and it's updated frequently.
Hard as it is fun

Lovely roguelike, AND no ads or paywalled content. This game shines amidst the sea of trash. I don't really like the new remastered music, and an option to toggle between the new and old music would be great, but otherwise the game is lovely

This is the most popular for a reason. It's stable, challenging, and the controls are simple yet very easy to use. Very replayable, but I wish they was another couple classes. The warrior is the most difficult with no unique features to exploit at lower levels.

It's a really imbalanced game,it purely operates in randomization thats why you gonna have high level enemies in the first floor,or second floor enemies will be just fully unkilliable,sure you can cheese trough some parts of it but even if you reach the first boss there is no chance of killing him. All the weapons and armor that you will find you can wear it,it doesnt save your progress so once you die you die forever

Based on the original pixel dungeon this game is much more detailed and super fun! One month later and I'm still having an absolute blast. I played the original pixel dungeon for years before discovering there were other (builds?) out there and I must say I absolutely freaking love how much shattered adds to the original pixel dungeon experience!
If you are looking for a retro feeling rogue like you should try this game.
Took me 96 games to reach end game. Thanks so much. Had a good time with the challenge.

This is the best spinoff of PD out there. The dev continuing to update is the cherry on top. I do like the new features. The base mode is a little too easy for experienced players, but the challenges fix that. I wish there were more variations of the challenges but hey, already very happy. Same as with the base PD, if you are giving this a negative review because it's "too hard" then this game is not meant for you. Go play angry birds or something else easy so you can feel good about yourself.

Best mobile game I have ever played. By far. The no ad, optional pay had me replaying this game for a LONG time before I remembered that someone needs to pay this guy for his efforts. Ill keep playing forever, too much replayability to not to.
Good job!
I like it. I think it's good not only for passing the time but it's also just fun to play.

This game is great to play when you want a good challenge. Each round I've found it to be a unique experience, I love how random the dungeon layouts to be, and the difficulty provides a good challenge. All the bad reviews, all seem to be complaints about the difficulty, so if you're not looking for something that'll be hard (trust me it is), just don't get the game. No need to leave a bad review because it's hard.
Amazing dungeon crawler, practically infinite replay value.
